hasMenuItem.name: Beyond Famous Star® with Cheese Combo
hasMenuItem.description:
The Beyond Famous Star features a 100% plant based Beyond Burger® patty on our iconic Famous Star® build. It’s a great option for those that do not want to sacrifice burgers but want to eat less meat or want a beef alternative. 

Charbroiled all-Beyond plant-based burger patty, melted cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, onions, pickles, special sauce, and mayo on a seeded bun, with your choice of side and fountain drink.

review.reviewBody: a tremendous burger and fantastic criisscut fries

Food was good enough, but when you pay for sauces, you expect to get them....paid for 2 and only got one. And that one was pathetic, container wasn't even half full. This was my first ever order from Carl's....so maybe there won't be a second one.

the Super Bacon Cheeseburger Big Angus Burger and Charbroiled Chicken Club Sandwich were both great. Hand-Breaded Chicken Tender (5 Pieces) was tasty but small pieces. fries were decent and the drink order was incorrect, ordered Nestea but got coke. Jalapeños Poppers were tasty as well. order was made and delivered much faster than estimated

This was the BEST Double JR Cheeseburger   I have ever had - the bun was super soft, the patty thick & juicy - I had gotten a JR-size as a first-time customer of Carl's - I highly recommend this burger! The poutine was a bit of a letdown, the fries were way too salty and there was a really chintzy amount of gravy.
As always the meal was delicious. The Hand-Scooped Oreo Ice Cream Shake is so smooth and has a really good taste with the chunks of real Oreo. The Jalapeños Poppers are always a favourite.
